titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the speedy clearing of lodgings for accommodation of the members of both houses, summoned to assemble in Oxford, the two and twentieth day of this instant moneth of Ianuary.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Oxford, the 15th day of January, 1643.
The dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 37; Steele notation: im- Sonnes faile.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
